snippet: Henrik Lundqvist, shaking off high expectations and some recent spotty performances, stopped 30 shots in the Rangers’ 4-2 victory against the Senators
abstract: New York Rangers goaltender Henrik Lundqvist, hungry for playoff success, stops 30 shots in team's 4-2 victory over the Ottawa Senators.
lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist, shaking off high expectations and some recent spotty performances, stopped 30 shots in the Rangers’ 4-2 victory against the Senators

headline.seo: Lundqvist Makes Big Saves When Rangers Need Them
headline.main: Lundqvist Sets the Stage by Standing His Ground
headline.print_headline: Lundqvist Sets the Stage By Standing His Ground
